verses.verse: מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who הֶאֱמִ֖ין <S%H539><s%> Who hath believed לִשְׁמֻעָתֵ֑נוּ <S%H8052><s%> bruit וּזְר֥וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> has the arm יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who נִגְלָֽתָה׃ <S%H1540><s%> revealed

וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> For he shall grow up כַּיּוֹנֵ֜ק <S%H3126><s%> him as a tender plant לְפָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> before וְכַשֹּׁ֙רֶשׁ֙ <S%H8328><s%> and as a root מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ground צִיָּ֔ה <S%H6723><s%> out of a dry לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has no תֹ֥אַר <S%H8389><s%> he hath no form ל֖וֹ וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הָדָ֑ר <S%H1926><s%> nor comeliness וְנִרְאֵ֥הוּ <S%H7200><s%> and when we shall see וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> him [there is] no beauty וְנֶחְמְדֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H2530><s%> that we should desire

נִבְזֶה֙ <S%H959><s%> He is despised וַחֲדַ֣ל <S%H2310><s%> and rejected אִישִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> of men אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man מַכְאֹב֖וֹת <S%H4341><s%> of sorrows וִיד֣וּעַ <S%H3045><s%> and acquainted חֹ֑לִי <S%H2483><s%> with grief וּכְמַסְתֵּ֤ר <S%H4564><s%> and we hid as it were פָּנִים֙ <S%H6440><s%> [our] faces מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at נִבְזֶ֖ה <S%H959><s%> from him he was despised וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not חֲשַׁבְנֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H2803><s%> and we esteemed

אָכֵ֤ן <S%H403><s%> Surely חֳלָיֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H2483><s%> our griefs ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> Himself נָשָׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> he hath borne וּמַכְאֹבֵ֖ינוּ <S%H4341><s%> our sorrows סְבָלָ֑ם <S%H5445><s%> and carried וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves חֲשַׁבְנֻ֔הוּ <S%H2803><s%> yet we did esteem נָג֛וּעַ <S%H5060><s%> him stricken מֻכֵּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> smitten אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God וּמְעֻנֶּֽה׃ <S%H6031><s%> and afflicted

וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> He מְחֹלָ֣ל <S%H2490><s%> But he [was] wounded מִפְּשָׁעֵ֔נוּ <S%H6588><s%> for our transgressions מְדֻכָּ֖א <S%H1792><s%> [he was] bruised מֵעֲוֹנֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> for our iniquities מוּסַ֤ר <S%H4148><s%> the chastisement שְׁלוֹמֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H7965><s%> of our peace עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and by וּבַחֲבֻרָת֖וֹ <S%H2250><s%> [was] upon him and with his stripes נִרְפָּא־ <S%H7495><s%> we are healed לָֽנוּ׃

כֻּלָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3605><s%> All כַּצֹּ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> All we like sheep תָּעִ֔ינוּ <S%H8582><s%> have gone astray אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> to his own way פָּנִ֑ינוּ <S%H6437><s%> we have turned וַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD הִפְגִּ֣יעַ <S%H6293><s%> hath laid בּ֔וֹ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> on him the iniquity כֻּלָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

נִגַּ֨שׂ <S%H5065><s%> He was oppressed וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He נַעֲנֶה֮ <S%H6031><s%> and he was afflicted וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יִפְתַּח־ <S%H6605><s%> yet he opened פִּיו֒ <S%H6310><s%> not his mouth כַּשֶּׂה֙ <S%H7716><s%> as a lamb לַטֶּ֣בַח <S%H2874><s%> to the slaughter יוּבָ֔ל <S%H2986><s%> he is brought וּכְרָחֵ֕ל <S%H7353><s%> and as a sheep לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before גֹזְזֶ֖יהָ <S%H1494><s%> her shearers נֶאֱלָ֑מָה <S%H481><s%> is dumb וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יִפְתַּ֖ח <S%H6605><s%> so he openeth פִּֽיו׃ <S%H6310><s%> not his mouth

מֵעֹ֤צֶר <S%H6115><s%> from prison וּמִמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> and from judgment לֻקָּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> He was taken וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דּוֹר֖וֹ <S%H1755><s%> his generation מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יְשׂוֹחֵ֑חַ <S%H7878><s%> and who shall declare כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נִגְזַר֙ <S%H1504><s%> was cut מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land חַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> of the living מִפֶּ֥שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> for the transgression עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> of my people נֶ֥גַע <S%H5061><s%> was he stricken לָֽמוֹ׃

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with רְשָׁעִים֙ <S%H7563><s%> with the wicked קִבְר֔וֹ <S%H6913><s%> his grave וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> was with עָשִׁ֖יר <S%H6223><s%> and with the rich בְּמֹתָ֑יו <S%H4194><s%> in his death עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> Because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no חָמָ֣ס <S%H2555><s%> no violence עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> because he had done וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor מִרְמָ֖ה <S%H4820><s%> neither [was any] deceit בְּפִֽיו׃ <S%H6310><s%> in his mouth

וַיהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חָפֵ֤ץ <S%H2654><s%> Yet it pleased דַּכְּאוֹ֙ <S%H1792><s%> to bruise הֶֽחֱלִ֔י <S%H2470><s%> him he hath put [him] to grief אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תָּשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> when thou shalt make אָשָׁם֙ <S%H817><s%> an offering for sin נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul יִרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> he shall see זֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> [his] seed יַאֲרִ֣יךְ <S%H748><s%> he shall prolong יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> [his] days וְחֵ֥פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> and the pleasure יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand יִצְלָֽח׃ <S%H6743><s%> shall prosper

מֵעֲמַ֤ל <S%H5999><s%> of the travail נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> of his soul יִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> He shall see יִשְׂבָּ֔ע <S%H7646><s%> [and] shall be satisfied בְּדַעְתּ֗וֹ <S%H1847><s%> by his knowledge יַצְדִּ֥יק <S%H6663><s%> justify צַדִּ֛יק <S%H6662><s%> shall my righteous עַבְדִּ֖י <S%H5650><s%> servant לָֽרַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וַעֲוֹנֹתָ֖ם <S%H5771><s%> their iniquities ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יִסְבֹּֽל׃ <S%H5445><s%> for he shall bear

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אֲחַלֶּק־ <S%H2505><s%> Therefore will I divide ל֣וֹ בָרַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> him [a portion] with the great וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with עֲצוּמִים֮ <S%H6099><s%> with the strong יְחַלֵּ֣ק <S%H2505><s%> and he shall divide שָׁלָל֒ <S%H7998><s%> the spoil תַּ֗חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> he הֶעֱרָ֤ה <S%H6168><s%> because he hath poured out לַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> unto death נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with פֹּשְׁעִ֖ים <S%H6586><s%> with the transgressors נִמְנָ֑ה <S%H4487><s%> and he was numbered וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> Himself חֵטְא־ <S%H2399><s%> the sin רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> of many נָשָׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> and he bare וְלַפֹּשְׁעִ֖ים <S%H6586><s%> for the transgressors יַפְגִּֽיעַ׃ <S%H6293><s%> and made intercession ס
